snippet.title: Adidas Running Shoes
snippet.description: A pedigreed race shoe with a responsive forefoot that pushes you forward, the adidas adizero adios 2 features minimal cushioning and a firm ride. The shoes are best suited for tempo runs and interval training, but can be used as daily trainers. Adidas adizero Boston 4 Men's Shoes Zest/Iron.
